name: Hardcore Parkour!
description:
Super Meat Boy meets IWBTG!

10 levels of pure masochism! What fun!

I know it's a scratch game but I'm quite proud of it so I decided to put it up here.

Creditz :

  • Music from Meat Boy (Flash)
  • Sounds from IWBTG, Wild Woody
  • Inspired by IWBTG, Super Meat Boy, and N
  • Platformer code from Griffpatch, Modified by me

original release
